name: KeyboardEvent.which
description: The which read-only property of the KeyboardEvent interface returns the numeric keyCode of the key pressed, or the character code (charCode) for an alphanumeric key pressed.

refs.name: Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification
refs.description: The definition of 'KeyboardEvent.which' in the 'Document Object Model (DOM) Level 3 Events Specification' specification.
